item.title: Communal stairway dirty, 13th November
item.description:
The communal stairwell in Trevelyan House is not cleaned daily on a regular basis. With people unfortunately using the stairs to smoke weed every morning it is dirty with ashes, roll up paper and spit.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hillingdon Street, Walworth, London

item.title: Montrose Avenue southside, 13th November
item.description:
There is a pile-up of unswept fallen leaves on the pavement and in the kerb area of the road which really need to be swept more often than fortnightly in the autumn/winter months. Neighbouring roads like Kingswood Ave are getting swept once a week. The build-up of unswept leaves is turning sticky with the rain and pressure of pedestrian traffic, and presents a slip hasard to users. Even when the pavement is swept, a residue of sticky, congealed leaves is left, and this accumulates. Similarly the kerbs are often not swept due to parked cars, and this accumulates in the same way. Kindly issue sweepers with stiff brooms so the sticky residue can be removed. Thank you.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Montrose Avenue, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lights not working on a pedestrian/cyclist bridge over Ravensbourne River (near River Mill Park), 13th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elder Walk, Ladywell, London
